sources.title: Global Digital Economy - The Rapidly Evolving E-Commerce and M-Commerce Markets
key_findings: The average revenue per user (ARPU) in the e-commerce market is projected to amount to US$1,020.80 in 2024.
Germany's ARPU in the e-commerce market is expected to amount to US$1,158.80 in 2024.
sources.usage_note: These findings provide a benchmark for ARPU in the e-commerce market, which could be relevant for the HappyNest business model.

sources.title: Digital Market Outlook
key_findings: The ARPU in the 'Digital Media' segment is expected to reach US$20.28 in 2024.
Germany's ARPU in the 'Digital Media' segment is expected to reach US$22.10 in 2024.
sources.usage_note: These findings provide a benchmark for ARPU in the digital media market, which could be relevant if HappyNest includes digital media services.

assumptions: Assuming that HappyNest operates in the e-commerce or digital media market.
